## FlexibleExtension type

Either a PrioritizedExtension or the actual Extension.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type FlexibleExtension<GExtension extends AnyExtension = any> = GExtension | PrioritizedExtension<GExtension>;
```

## Remarks

This is used by the extension manager to allow for a more flexible initialization.
